message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I think the product is quite valuable, but I'm only able to pay up to $150 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget, but I can't let it go for that low. How about we meet in the middle at $175?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still not able to meet at $175. Considering the value of the product, I believe $150 is the maximum I can afford. Could you possibly reconsider your offer?
